purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of layout templates for layered electrical design where the templates provide a specific function in the design. The templates may be predefined and stored in a library.

inscope.li: items within the scope of application module Analytical model, ISO/CD-TS 10303-1603;
items within the scope of application module Extended geometric tolerance, ISO/CD-TS 10303-1666;
items within the scope of application module Fabrication technology, ISO/CD-TS 10303-1670;
items within the scope of application module Feature and connection zone, ISO/CD-TS 10303-1671;
items within the scope of application module Network functional usage view, ISO/CD-TS 10303-1705;
items within the scope of application module Non feature shape element, ISO/CD-TS 10303-1706;
items within the scope of application module Physical layout template, ISO/CD-TS 10303-1722;
items within the scope of application module Shape property assignment, ISO/TS 10303-1032;
items within the scope of application module Value with unit extension, ISO/CD-TS 10303-1753.
